task.title: Create Reversing Entries
task.shortdesc: Reverse a payroll entry to remove wages containing an incorrect tax jurisdiction or tax category.

ul.li: Reversing entries do not remove direct deposit history: If you reverse a payment that should have been voided, the General Ledger may not balance because direct deposits were not reversed. Manually update the General Ledger after reversing a payment.
Reversing entries do not adjust arrears: Manually update employee arrears balance after reversing a payment, if needed.
Reversing entries do not remove accruals: Manually adjust accruals on the employeeâ€™s profile after reversing a payment, if needed.

context.p: Any payments made within the current year or immediate prior year can be reversed. Reversals posts to the pay period in the selected quarter. Do not reverse employee opening balances; contact your Account Manager for correction to opening balances.

step.cmd: From the Create Reversing Entries page, use the Find By option to search for employees.
Select the employee's name. The Reversing Entries page appears.
